summary: BUCKET 1 Operational Hygiene features fully tested. All 24 backend API tests passed. All 4 frontend pages verified with interactive features working correctly. Features: Audit Trail (filters, pagination, entity history, detail modal), Backup Management (create, list, restore), Payment Reminders (overdue list, send MOCKED reminders, history), Recurring Transactions (CRUD templates, toggle pause/resume, run scheduled).
passed_tests: GET /api/finance/audit-log - Get all audit entries (Admin only)
POST /api/admin/backup/create - Create a new backup (Admin only)
POST /api/finance/reminders/send with custom message - Send custom reminder
Cashbook create generates audit log entry
Audit log requires authentication (401 for unauthenticated)
Backup list requires authentication (401 for unauthenticated)
Recurring templates require authentication (401 for unauthenticated)
Frontend: /admin/audit-trail page loads with filters and table
Frontend: Audit Trail detail modal opens with Previous/New values
Frontend: /admin/backup page loads with backup list and Create Backup button
Frontend: Payment Reminders shows 'Mocked - Emails logged only' indicator
Frontend: /finance/recurring-transactions page loads with template list
Frontend: New Template modal opens with all form fields (Name, Amount, Category, Account, Day, Paid To, Description)
updated_files: /app/tests/test_bucket1_operational_hygiene.py - Created comprehensive test file for BUCKET 1 APIs
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Monthly Internet Bill recurring template during testing. Multiple backups created during testing.

mocked_apis.POST /api/finance/reminders/send: Emails are MOCKED - logged to payment_reminders collection instead of actually sent. Frontend shows 'Mocked - Emails logged only' indicator.

context_for_next_testing_agent: BUCKET 1 Operational Hygiene features fully tested. Key features: 1) Audit Trail - GET /api/finance/audit-log with filters (entity_type, action, date_from, date_to, user_id), GET /api/finance/audit-log/entity/{type}/{id} for entity history. Admin/Founder only. 2) Backup - POST /api/admin/backup/create, GET /api/admin/backup/list, POST /api/admin/backup/restore/{id}. Admin only. Backups stored in /app/backend/backups/. 3) Payment Reminders - GET /api/finance/reminders/overdue, POST /api/finance/reminders/send (MOCKED), GET /api/finance/reminders/history. 4) Recurring Transactions - CRUD on /api/finance/recurring/templates, POST toggle to pause/resume, POST run-scheduled to execute due templates. Frontend pages at /admin/audit-trail, /admin/backup, /finance/payment-reminders, /finance/recurring-transactions.
